abstract: The purchase of the 62-year-old publisher includes more than 3,000 back-list titles, Amazon said.
snippet: The purchase of the 62-year-old publisher includes more than 3,000 back-list titles, Amazon said.
lead_paragraph: Amazon.com has expanded its publishing reach again by acquiring Avalon Books, a small, 62-year-old publisher that specializes in romance and mysteries.

headline.main: Amazon Buys Avalon Books, Publisher in Romance and Mysteries
